attributes.action: Extend the use of internet and telepone based voting systems to the proceedings of the House of Commons as a means of allowing direct participation of the electorate in parliamentary votes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The use of internet and telephone based voting systems have the potential to enable an electorate, who are better informed and educated than ever before, to directly participate in the work of the House of Commons. At a time when there is increasing disillusionment in the political process the use of such voting systems provides a means of providing direct access to the decision making processes of Parliament.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
